articles.author: Jonnelle Marte
articles.title: Fed Meeting: Consumer Resilience Is About to Be Tested by Rate Decision - Bloomberg
articles.description: The surprising resilience of American consumers is about to be tested over the coming months, as rising delinquencies, growing debt payments and dwindling cash piles put pressure on household balance sheets.
